column2: children=[[Vidumavi]]; apparently other children too (considering [[Marhari]] is the descendant of Vidugavia)<ref name="Children">{{UT

column1: '''Vidugavia''' was a prince of the [[Northmen]], self-styled "[[King of Rhovanion]]" who ruled the lands between [[Mirkwood]] and the [[River Running]].<ref name="gondor">{{App
He was the ally of [[Gondor]]'s King [[Rómendacil II]], and helped him to his victory against the [[Easterlings]] in {{TA
column2: 1248}}.  He also received Rómendacil's son [[Valacar]] into his court as ambassador in {{TA
column4: n}}. Valacar would eventually wed Vidugavia's own daughter, [[Vidumavi]].<ref name="gondor"/>

column1: Vidugavia was apparently the father of other children, since he was also an ancestor of [[Marhari]].<ref name="Children">{{UT

column2: Cirion}}, Note 6</ref> In Germanic literature, it has been a name used for [[Wikipedia:Wayland Smith
